title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.

Made a mobile payment is higher than any other categories with value 64.0, followed by Paid a bill, and Purchase in-app or online. Down to category Sent money internationally with the lowest value of 2.0.
The highest value at Made a mobile payment is almost 32.0 times larger than the minimum value of Sent money internationally.
The highest value at Made a mobile payment is almost 32.0 times larger than the minimum value of Sent money internationally.
The difference between the max Response Made a mobile payment and min Response Sent money internationally is 62.0.
